element.label: identifier
element.short: Business Identifiers that are specific to a role/location
element.definition: Business Identifiers that are specific to a role/location.

element.label: period
element.short: The period during which the practitioner is authorized to perform in these role(s)
element.definition: The period during which the person is authorized to act as a practitioner in these role(s) for the organization.

element.label: practitioner
element.short: Practitioner that is able to provide the defined services for the organation
element.definition: Practitioner that is able to provide the defined services for the organation.

element.label: organization
element.short: Organization where the roles are available
element.definition: The organization where the Practitioner performs the roles associated.

element.label: code
element.short: Roles which this practitioner may perform
element.definition: Roles which this practitioner is authorized to perform for the organization.
element.comment: eg SMO, RMO - use the statistics NZ occupation codeset

element.label: location
element.short: The location(s) at which this practitioner provides care
element.definition: The location(s) at which this practitioner provides care.

element.label: telecom
element.short: Contact details that are specific to the role/location/service
element.definition: Contact details that are specific to the role/location/service.

element.label: creator
element.definition: The organisation and person that created this role
element.comment: Could practitioner role be an option?

element.label: person
element.definition: The person who created the role
element.comment: Is this always a Practitioner? (ie has a CPN identity within the HPI)

element.label: organization
element.definition: The organization where the person was working (acting on behalf of?)

element.label: status
element.definition: The status of the role - active,ended
element.comment: implied by the 'endReason' attribute. ie that roles can be returned that are no longer active

element.label: active
element.definition: True if the role is active at the time it was returned

element.label: statusReason
element.definition: The reason for the current status - endOfRotation, endOfContract, enteredInError
element.comment: Generally used when the role is not active
